projects.title: Expense Management System
projects.description: Built a comprehensive expense management system with automated validation, role-based access controls, and real-time reporting capabilities. Designed 15+ relational tables, views, and stored procedures to handle transactional data efficiently.
projects.challenge: Manual expense tracking was causing 5+ hours per week overhead and frequent data inconsistencies, affecting financial decision-making.
projects.solution: Implemented an automated Oracle database system with SQL-based validation, ETL processes, and role-based security controls.
impact: Improved data integrity across all financial records

projects.title: Production Analytics Automation Workflow
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive workflow automation system using n8n to integrate multiple data sources including APIs, spreadsheets, and email systems. Built dynamic ETL pipelines with intelligent error detection and automated escalation.
projects.challenge: Manual KPI reporting was time-consuming, error-prone, and delayed critical business insights by days.
projects.solution: Created automated workflows that pull data from multiple sources, process it through ETL pipelines, and deliver real-time insights via dashboards and alerts.
impact: Replaced manual reporting with full automation

projects.title: Hospital Operations Management System
projects.description: Built a comprehensive full-stack platform to automate hospital scheduling, records management, and staff workflows. Implemented robust role-based access controls to ensure HIPAA compliance while improving operational efficiency.
projects.challenge: Manual scheduling and records management was creating bottlenecks, taking 25% more time than necessary and delaying critical responses.
projects.solution: Developed a full-stack solution with React frontend, Django backend, and SQL database, featuring automated workflows and role-based security.
impact: 40% faster response time for critical events
